org.parboiled
Class BaseParser<V,A extends Actions<V>>

java.lang.Object
  org.parboiled.BaseParser<V,A>
Type Parameters:
V - The type of the value field of the parse tree nodes created by this parser.
A - The type of the parser Actions you would like to use in your rules. If you don't need any parser actions (e.g. for very simple examples) you can just use the Actions
